title: My wife and I both have new pixel 4a s. When I talk to her pixel to pixel the sound is tinny fromher
content: We both have Pixel 4 A's when I'm talking to her Pixel to Pixel when she's talking to me her voice is very tinny very kind of staticky just very digital like but annoying somewhat popping sounding like....I'm wondering if the microphone on her Pixel 4A there could be something wrong with it?
